title: BookWise
description: BookWise is a web application that allows users to Create a book management system that allows users to track and manage their personal library.

title: ShoppingHub
description: It demonstrates the capabilities of the MERN stack combined with Mongoose, offering a feature-rich and user-friendly online shopping experience.

title: Memory Game
description: This is a memory game where the user needs to match pairs of images hidden behind cards. The game uses two server-side APIs to provide the images and jokes displayed on the page.
